titulo.frase: There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow man; true nobility is being superior to your former self.

servicios.descripcionServicios1: As a freelance web developer, I'm here to help you create a strong and effective online presence. Whether you need a personal website, blog, business website, or any other web-related project, I can provide tailor-made solutions to meet your needs. Below, you will find a description of the services that I include:
servicios.lista4: Search engine optimization and positioning (SEO) to increase visibility on the web.
servicios.lista5: Adaptive design to be viewed on computers, tablets and cell phones.
servicios.descripcionServicios2: I also offer the web maintenance service (if you want) to ensure the proper functioning and security of your website; such as updating the system, making some modification or simply uploading content.

proyectos.descripcionProyecto1: Page dedicated to making a brief summary of the soloist stage of the musician Gustavo Adrián Cerati. Likewise, you can find some extras.
